jobDescription: LOC Federal CU is looking for a data analyst at its Farmington location. This position is responsible for data warehouse administration, data consolidation, data analysis and management reporting.. Qualifications include: 2 years computer training; degree in computer science or related field, or an equivalent combination of education, training, and experience; understanding of related programming languages and procedures, preferably SQL and PowerOn; 1 to 3 years of related programming experience with Symitar and/or credit union experience preferred. Must have good interpersonal skills, strong problem solving skills, solid organizational abilities and attention to detail, willingness to assist and support others, demonstrate creative dynamic thinking; strong quantitative, data tabulation and analytic skills, solid communication skills (interpersonal, written and oral), and the ability to work independently.Job Posted by ApplicantPro
